text: shane_walsh Oh , he 's fine .
glenn_rhee Why 'd he bail then ?
andrea_harrison Yeah . Where 's Dale ?
lori_grimes Hey . Where 'd you go ?
rick_grimes I 'm here .
shane_walsh He 's on his way .
glenn_rhee Um , guys . So . the barn is full of walkers .
shane_walsh You can not tell me you 're all right with this .
rick_grimes No I 'm not , but we 're guests here . This Is n't our land .
shane_walsh This is our lives !
glenn_rhee Lower your voice .
andrea_harrison We ca n't just sweep this under the rug .

shane_walsh It ai n't right . Not remotely . Okay , we 've either got to go in there , we 've got to make things right or we 've just got to go . Now we have been talking about Fort Benning for a long time .
rick_grimes We ca n't go .
shane_walsh Why , Rick ? Why ?
carol_peletier Because my daughter is still out there .
shane_walsh Okay . Okay , I think It 's time that we all start to just consider the other possibility .
rick_grimes We 're not leaving Sophia behind .
daryl_dixon I 'm close to finding this girl . I just found her damn doll two days ago .
shane_walsh You found her doll , Daryl . That 's what you did . You found a doll .
daryl_dixon You do n't know what the hell you 're talking about .
shane_walsh I 'm just saying what needs to be said . You get a good lead , it 's in the first 48 hours .
rick_grimes Shane , stop .

shane_walsh Let me tell you something else , man . If she was alive out there and saw you coming all methed out with your buck knife and geek ears around your neck , she would run in the other direction .
rick_grimes Back off !
shane_walsh Keep your hands off me .
rick_grimes Now just let me talk to Hershel . Let me figure it out .
shane_walsh What are you gon na figure out ? !
rick_grimes If we 're gon na stay , if we 're gon na clear this barn , I have to talk him into it . This is his land .
dale_horvath hershel sees those things in there as people -- sick people -- his wife , his stepson .
rick_grimes You knew ?
dale_horvath Yesterday I talked to hershel .
shane_walsh And you waited the night ?
dale_horvath I thought we could survive one more night . We did . I was waiting till this morning to say something . But glenn wanted to be the one .
shane_walsh The man is crazy , Rick , if hershel thinks those things are alive or no .
glenn_rhee Maggie . Hey , Maggie , just talk to me . Hey . maggie .
maggie_greene Give me your hat . You said talk to you , I 'm talking to you . Give me your hat .
glenn_rhee Why would you waste an egg like that ?
maggie_greene I think it was rotten .
carl_grimes Does shane think Sophia 's dead ?
lori_grimes Shane 's just scared .
carl_grimes Of the walkers in the barn ?
lori_grimes Yeah .
carl_grimes Mom , I 'm not leaving until we find Sophia . And I do n't want to go even after that .
lori_grimes Well , we 're not leaving , Carl . You finish those problems .
carl_grimes I just think she -- she 's gon na like it here . This place , it could be a home .
carol_peletier You ca n't .
daryl_dixon I 'm fine .
carol_peletier hershel said you need to heal .
daryl_dixon Yeah , I do n't care .
carol_peletier Well , I do . Rick 's going out later to follow the trail .
daryl_dixon Yeah well , I ai n't gon na sit around and do nothing .
carol_peletier No , you 're gon na go out there and get yourself hurt even worse . We do n't know if we 're gon na find her , Daryl . We do n't . I do n't .
daryl_dixon What ?
carol_peletier Ca n't lose you too .
carol_peletier Are you all right ?
daryl_dixon Just leave me be . Stupid bitch .
glenn_rhee Andrea 's looking for you .
dale_horvath Thank you , glenn .
glenn_rhee Any chance you got an extra hat ?
dale_horvath Nope .
glenn_rhee Thanks .
andrea_harrison Going off with rick to look for Sophia .
dale_horvath I thought he was talking with hershel .
andrea_harrison He is . We 're gon na go after . I 'm headed to the barn in the meantime . shane wants a watch duty down there .
dale_horvath Does Rick ?
andrea_harrison Why would n't he ?
dale_horvath Are you only getting yours ? I do n't know what 's going on .
andrea_harrison Him ?
dale_horvath shane .
andrea_harrison dale .
hershel_greene Hi , honey . carl does n't need any more of my help .
dale_horvath It 's not my business . All that matters to me is that you -- you may not really know him .
andrea_harrison We do n't need to do this . You and I are finally-- .
dale_horvath It 's important .
andrea_harrison I get it . You do n't like him .
dale_horvath It is n't that .
andrea_harrison Then what is it ?
dale_horvath Is that how you want to be ? Like him ?
andrea_harrison He 's not a victim .
dale_horvath You do n't know him .
andrea_harrison Dale , I need to stop . You spend so much time watching me , looking out for me .
dale_horvath You want to beat me up anytime I show any concern . Go ahead . I 'm done .
andrea_harrison I 'm not beating you up , Dale . I 'm okay , really . Things are . different .
dale_horvath You got your gun .
andrea_harrison Okay .
glenn_rhee You okay ?
dale_horvath Yeah .
dale_horvath You mind running and getting me some water ? I just -- I need a second .
glenn_rhee You 'll keep watch ? Dale ?
dale_horvath Yeah sure .
hershel_greene Come on in .
rick_grimes A little light reading for lunch ?
hershel_greene Been working so hard lately I get my studying where I can .
rick_grimes You know we can help you out with your work .
hershel_greene It 's my field to tend .
rick_grimes We found the barn .
hershel_greene Leave it be .
rick_grimes Well , I 'd like to talk about it , but either way -- your barn , your farm , your say .
hershel_greene I do n't want to talk about the barn . I do n't want to debate .
rick_grimes Not a debate , a discussion .
hershel_greene I need you and your group gone by the end of the week .

rick_grimes I talked to Dale . You and I have our differences with the way we look at the walkers . Those people , they may be dead , they may be alive . But my people , us , we are alive right now , right here , right in front of you . You send us out there and that could change .
hershel_greene I 've given you safe harbor . My conscience is clear .

rick_grimes This farm -- this farm is special . You 've been shielded from what 's going on out there . dale said you saw everything happen on the news . Well , It 's been -- It 's been a long time since the cameras stopped rolling . The first time I saw a walker it was just half a body snapping at me from the ground . My inclination was n't to kill it . But what the world is out there is n't what you saw on TV . It is much much worse and it changes you . Either into one of them or something a lot less than the person you were . Please do not -- do not send us out there again . My wife 's pregnant . That 's either a gift here or a death sentence out there . If we were to stay we could help you with the work , with securing this place . We can survive together .
hershel_greene Rick , I 'm telling you we ca n't .
rick_grimes You think about what you 're doing .
hershel_greene I 've thought about it .
rick_grimes Think about it .
hershel_greene I 've thought about it .
rick_grimes Think about it again . We ca n't go out there .
shane_walsh What 's it gon na be , man ? Which way does this thing go ?
rick_grimes I do n't know yet .
shane_walsh Well , what did he say ?
rick_grimes We 're negotiating .
shane_walsh You 're nego -- clock 's ticking , rick .
rick_grimes No it is n't , Shane . That barn -- the barn is secure . We did n't even know about it till this morning .

shane_walsh We did n't . Well , we know about it now . Right ? We know there 's over a dozen walkers in there . We know that it 's about a stone 's throw from our camp , Rick -- where we sleep . So look , if we 're not gon na go in there and clear it out then we just got to go .
rick_grimes We 're not gon na clear it out and we 're not gon na go .
shane_walsh We at least need our guns .
rick_grimes We ca n't have them , not here .
shane_walsh Why do you want to stay here when it 's not safe ?
rick_grimes We can make it safe .
shane_walsh How we gon na do that ?
rick_grimes We will , okay ?
shane_walsh How we gon na make it safe ?
rick_grimes We will , okay ?
shane_walsh No , man , it 's not okay .
rick_grimes Shane , Lori 's pregnant . We need to stay .
shane_walsh We need our guns .
rick_grimes No , I can work this out . You good ?
shane_walsh Yeah . Lori 's having a baby , man . Congratulations .
rick_grimes Thank you .
maggie_greene So that 's it ?

hershel_greene rick was trying to make his case . It 'll be hard . They 'll have to be careful . But he was being dramatic . They 're a strong group . They 've done well on their own . They 're just gon na have to go out and find their own farm . There 's plenty of them now to chose from .
maggie_greene There are n't . Every one of them nearby is burned out or full of walkers .
hershel_greene Walkers ? So we just keep these people here forever ? How are they my responsibility ?

maggie_greene A new command I give to you love one another as I have loved you . That 's what you told me , right ? I was mad about mom . Mad about you marrying Annette . I was 14 years old and I was awful , to you more than anybody . All I wanted to do was smoke and shoplift . Love one another . That 's what you told me .
hershel_greene Maggie . That was different .
maggie_greene No . You 're different .
hershel_greene I am . But we 're not . I love you . That 's part of this . Is this about you and the Asian boy ? Do you want me to-- .
maggie_greene No .

maggie_greene His name is Glenn . He saved my life yesterday when one of the people you think is sick tried to kill me . How 's that for dramatic ? Things are n't what you think they are . They are n't . Do n't do this . Okay ? It 's not about me and Glenn . It 's not about me and you . It 's about you . It 's about who you are , who you 're gon na be .
jimmy Hershel ! It happened again .

rick_grimes . Also shows she could be moving this way south . If Sophia kept in that direction , she might have gotten out of the forest and into the farmland . So we take 74 up to Ivy road , then push down south on foot through the forest till we hit Christopher , go east a couple of miles and then double back .
hershel_greene rick .
rick_grimes Hershel . We just have our guns out because we 're gon na go look for Sophia .
hershel_greene Before you do that , I could use your help with something .
andrea_harrison Count me in .
hershel_greene Thank you . But I just need rick .
andrea_harrison I 'll be down at the barn keeping watch until you 're ready .
shane_walsh I thought he was dead .
lori_grimes Shane , I don't-- .

shane_walsh Then when he came back , right then , right there , you see I wished he was . Not -- not because you would n't be mine , but because I knew that sooner or later he would be dead . See Rick , he ai n't built for this world , not for what it is now .
lori_grimes You 're wrong . You 're wrong .

shane_walsh Lori , how many times has he saved your life ? I just -- I want to know how many times . Because by my account , I 've saved your life on four different occasions and that 's Carl 's too . So I just want to ask you , how many times has rick saved your life ?
lori_grimes That night at the camp . That night at the camp . After the Fish Fry .

shane_walsh No no no . See , no . That was me to . You see , Rick , he showed up late because he went on a suicide mission over nothing . Yeah , he joined in , but see , we would n't have been in that situation if he had n't left because he felt that he needed to leave to save a drug dealer . And so we lost Amy and we lost Jim . We lost -- rick told me .
lori_grimes Told you what ?
shane_walsh And I know the reason why you did n't is because you know it 's mine .
lori_grimes It 's Rick 's .
shane_walsh Okay . You know , we carried on quite a bit before rick got back , Lori . It 's mine . You know it is .

lori_grimes You 're wrong . You 're wrong . I 'm sorry . Shane , I 'm sorry . But even if it 's yours , it 's not gon na be yours . It 's never gon na be yours and there 's nothing you can do to change that .
shane_walsh I do n't need to .
carl_grimes Hey , Shane . Can I talk to you for a sec ?
shane_walsh You okay ?
carl_grimes Yeah . I know you think Sophia 's dead . And that we should stop looking for her . But that 's bullshit .
shane_walsh Hey , man , watch your mouth .
carl_grimes We 're gon na stay here until we find her .
shane_walsh You think that 's what we should do ?
carl_grimes It 's what I know we should do .
shane_walsh Then we stay . That means we got to do whatever we got to do to make that happen . Hmm ?
carl_grimes Like help out with chores ?
shane_walsh Mmm . Like help out with the chores .
lori_grimes Carl . Come her for a minute .
shane_walsh Why do n't you go see what your mom wants ? Hmm ? Go on . Hey , Carl . Do n't let me hear you talk like that again .
glenn_rhee S'up .
shane_walsh Son of a bitch .
shane_walsh You see where he went ?
glenn_rhee Who ?
shane_walsh Do n't even try to shit me , okay ?
glenn_rhee What ?
shane_walsh Dale , Glenn . Did you see where dale went ?
glenn_rhee Yeah , he asked me to run and get him some water . He said he 'd cover me on watch .
shane_walsh And he was gone when you got back , huh ?
glenn_rhee Yeah . You think he 's okay ?
shane_walsh So you would n't tell me which way he went .
glenn_rhee I do n't get it .
shane_walsh No , man , you do n't .
hershel_greene The silt on the bottom is like glue . You just sink in .
hershel_greene That 's Lou Bush .
rick_grimes You knew him ?

hershel_greene Lou as in Louise . She has a farm up the road . Sweet corn mostly . Worked at hapman 's bar on weekends . The man , I do n't know him , but the coveralls , I 've been to where he worked . How many have you killed ?
rick_grimes Too many to count .
hershel_greene Can you stop ? There are people out there who have n't been in their right minds , people who I believe can be restored .
rick_grimes You 're not talking about the walkers , are you ?

hershel_greene It does n't matter if you see them as human beings anymore . But if you and your people are going to stay here , that 's how you 're gon na have to treat them . My farm , my barn , my say .
daryl_dixon You see it ?
carol_peletier See what ?
daryl_dixon I 'll find her . Hey , I 'm sorry about what happened this morning .
carol_peletier You wanted to look for her . Why ? This whole time I 've just wanted to ask you .
daryl_dixon 'Cause I think she 's still out there . Truth is , what else I got to do ?
carol_peletier We 'll find her . We will . I see it .
glenn_rhee Maggie . Hey . Maggie . Maggie , just stop for a second .
maggie_greene You talked about it . You told Dale , fine . I asked you . I told you . I just asked you for one thing . One thing .
glenn_rhee I could n't do it .
maggie_greene My dad 's gon na kick you guys out now . He told me .
glenn_rhee No , Rick 's gon na work something out with your dad . Okay ? I had to tell them .
maggie_greene You did not .

glenn_rhee No , I did . I wanted to . Listen , you see I forgot . Okay ? I forgot or I stopped thinking about it or maybe I did n't want to think about it . I let them lower me into that well like it was fun , like I was playing """" polar """" . It 's a video game .
maggie_greene Of course it 's a video game .

glenn_rhee And then the pharmacy happened yesterday and I realized something . I forgot that they 're dangerous . I do n't care if they 're sick people or dead people , they 're dangerous . And then I realized something else . That I do n't want you in danger ever . So I hate to blow your dad 's big secret , but I 'm sick of secrets . Secrets get you killed . And I 'd rather have you pissed off at me and alive than liking me and dead . So that 's why I told them .
maggie_greene Hey , walker bait .
glenn_rhee Do n't call me that .
maggie_greene Okay , glenn .
shane_walsh Man , this is a good hiding place . We ai n't been in the swamps much , huh ?
dale_horvath Imagine if you applied your tracking skills to finding Sophia .
shane_walsh How about you just give me that bag , huh ?
dale_horvath I 'm not gon na do that .
shane_walsh Yeah you are , Dale . Unless , well , you do have that rifle over your shoulder .
dale_horvath You gon na shoot me like you did Otis ? Tell another story ?
shane_walsh No , man . Hell , when you really look at it in the cold light of day , you 're pretty much dead already . Just give me the guns . Do it now .
dale_horvath You think this is gon na keep us safe ?
shane_walsh Mm - hmm . I know it is .
dale_horvath rick is trying to get Hershel-- .
shane_walsh Dale , shut up . Just shut up and give me the guns .
dale_horvath Am I gon na have to shoot you ? Do I have to kill you ? Is that what it 's gon na take ?
shane_walsh Eh . Yeah . That 's what it 's gon na take .
dale_horvath This is where you belong , shane .
shane_walsh How 's that , Dale ?

dale_horvath This world , what it is now , this is where you belong . And I may not have what it takes to last for long , but that 's okay . 'Cause at least I can say when the world goes to shit I did n't let it take me down with it .
shane_walsh Fair enough .
maggie_greene You look like you should be in line for the early bird special . Go get your cap . I 'll wash it for you , okay ?
theodore_douglas Do you know what 's going on ?
andrea_harrison Where is everyone ?
glenn_rhee You have n't seen rick .
andrea_harrison He went off with Hershel . We were supposed to leave a couple hours ago .
daryl_dixon Yeah you were . What the hell ?
carol_peletier rick told us he was going out .
daryl_dixon Damn it . Is n't anybody taking this seriously ? We got us a damn trail . Oh , here we go . What 's all this ?
shane_walsh You with me , man ?
daryl_dixon Yeah .
shane_walsh Time to grow up . You already got yours ?
theodore_douglas Thought we could n't carry .

shane_walsh We can and we have to . Look , it was one thing sitting around here picking daisies when we thought this place was supposed to be safe . But now we know it ai n't . How about you , man ? You gon na protect yours ? That 's it . Can you shoot ?
maggie_greene Can you stop ? You do this , you hand out these guns , my dad will make you leave tonight .
carl_grimes We have to stay , shane .
lori_grimes What is this ?

shane_walsh We ai n't going anywhere , okay ? Now look , Hershel , he 's just got ta understand . Okay ? He -- well , he 's gon na have to . Now we need to find Sophia . Am I right ? Huh ? Now I want you to take this . You take it , Carl , and you keep your mother safe . You do whatever it takes . You know how . Go on , take the the gun and do it .
lori_grimes rick said no guns . This is not your call . This is not your decision to make .
theodore_douglas Oh shit .
shane_walsh What is that ? What is that ?
lori_grimes Shane !
shane_walsh What the hell are you doing ?
rick_grimes Shane , just back off .
hershel_greene Why do your people have guns ?
shane_walsh Are you kidding me ? You see ? You see what they 're holding onto ?
hershel_greene I see who I 'm holding onto .
shane_walsh No , man , you do n't .
rick_grimes Shane , just let us do this and then we can talk .

shane_walsh What you want to talk about , Rick ? These things ai n't sick . They 're not people . They 're dead . Ai n't gon na feel nothing for them 'cause all they do , they kill ! These things right here , they 're the things that killed Amy . They killed Otis . They 're gon na kill all of us .
rick_grimes Shane , shut up !
shane_walsh Hey , hershel man , let me ask you something . Could a living breathing person , could they walk away from this ?
rick_grimes No ! Stop it !
shane_walsh That 's three rounds in the chest . Could someone who 's alive , could they just take that ? ! Why is it still coming ?
shane_walsh That 's it 's heart , it 's lungs . Why is it still coming ?
rick_grimes Shane , enough .
shane_walsh Yeah , you 're right , man . That is enough .

shane_walsh Enough risking our lives for a little girl who 's gone ! Enough living next to a barn full of things that are trying to kill us . Enough . Rick , it ai n't like it was before ! Now if y' all want to live , if you want to survive , you got to fight for it ! I 'm talking about fighting right here , right now .
rick_grimes Take the snare pole . Hershel , take the snare pole . Hershel , listen to me , man , please . Take it now . Hershel ! Take it !
rick_grimes No , Shane . Do not do this , brother . Wait !
glenn_rhee Do n't do it !
lori_grimes Rick !
rick_grimes Please !
shane_walsh Come on . Come on , we 're out here .
rick_grimes This is not the way ! Please !
lori_grimes Get behind me .
shane_walsh Come on .
glenn_rhee maggie .
maggie_greene It 's okay .
rick_grimes Stay back ! Stop !
carol_peletier Sophia ? Sophia ! Sophia . Sophia . On no . Sophia . Sophia .
lori_grimes No .
carol_peletier Sophia .
lori_grimes Do n't watch .
